name: Hex Base
description:
Hex Base

A free online board game. The goal of the game is to either capture 3 of the enemy's tokens or to land on their base tile.

Defend and attack your opponent's tokens by using 5 tokens and several movement cards.

How to Play


A full how to play guide can be found in the following link:

hexbasegame.com/about

Multiplayer

Please visit the full website to challenge random people online or to create rooms to play against friends:

hexbasegame.com

Game By

Christopher Concio
